Detabase
  • Dashboard

The JSON

“ Database ”

for your projects

Detabase provides a HTTP based JSON database service for free to help you get started with your projects easily!

Get started
Read the docs

How Detabase works

Detabase provides a REST API that you can use to make requests and store your JSON based data easily.

1

Get your unique bucket ID

Visit Detabase Dashboard and get your unique bucket ID. This bucket ID will acts as your personal namespace for storing data.

2

Make Requests

Make standard HTTP requests suchs as POST, PUT and PATCH to store your data in the root of your namespace or a seperate collection if you wish.

3

Query your data

Query your data using GET request from the root of your namespace or a seperate collection. Add sort, filter, limit to your queries to get sanitized data back.

4

Modify your Data

Modify or delete your records using PUT, PATCH or DELETE requests on a namespace, a collection or even an individual record.

Detabase is...

Simple

Zero configuration required and super easy to use.

Free

Detabase is completely free to use and always will be.

Lightning Fast

Saving your data is just a HTTP call away.

Backend Agnostic

Use detabase with a backend server or even directly from the browser.

Host your own instance

Use Detabase as a free service or host your own private instance.

Backed by MongoDB

Unlimited possibilites in terms of structure of the data you can store.

Love Detabase?

Detabase is fully open-source , if you like it please leave a star on github.

If you'd like to contribute to Detabase feel free to raise a PR.
